          <title>
            <string language="fi">Valumassan kaataminen</string>
            <string language="en">Pouring of the mass</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gießen der Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Verser de la masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Derramar da massa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Versandosi della massa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έκχυση της μάζας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El verter de la masa</string>
          </title>
          <language>fi</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fi">Piirroksessa näytetään, miten valumassa kaadetaan kaksi- tai useampiosaiseen valumuottiin.</string>
            <string language="en">The drawing shows how the mass is poured into a mould of two or several pieces.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mould</string>
            <string language="en">massa</string>
            <string language="en">pouring</string>
            <string language="fi">käsityökasvatus</string>
            <string language="fi">useampiosaiset</string>
            <string language="fi">muottitekniikka,</string>
            <string language="fi">käsityö</string>
            <string language="fi">savi</string>
            <string language="fi">kaksi-</string>
            <string language="fi">valumuotit</string>
            <string language="fi">tai</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Zeichnung zeigt, wie die Masse in eine Form 
von zwei oder einigen Stücken gegossen wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le schéma montre comment la masse est versée 
dans un moule de deux ou plusieurs morceaux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O desenho mostra como a massa é derramada em um 
molde de duas ou diversas partes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'illustrazione mostra come la massa è versata 
in una muffa di due o parecchie parti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το σχέδιο επιδεικνύει πώς η μάζα χύνεται σε μια 
φόρμα δύο ή περισσότερων κομματιών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El gráfico muestra cómo la masa se vierte en un
molde de dos o varios pedazos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Form</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">massa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
